recommendations: Gaurav Modi â€œI had the pleasure of working with Himanshu on our AI chatbot project, Genie, and was consistently impressed by his skills and mindset. He has a strong knack for problem-solving and approaches challenges with clarity and creativity. One of his standout strengths is how quickly he picks up new concepts - whether technical frameworks or domain-specific nuances, and applies them effectively. What makes Himanshu even more valuable is his ability to bridge the gap between technical and non-technical stakeholders. He explains complex ideas in simple, actionable terms, ensuring everyone is aligned and confident in the direction forward. This not only accelerated our progress but also fostered smoother collaboration across the team. Himanshu would be an asset to any team, and I look forward to seeing the impact he continues to create in the AI space and beyond.â€

Sahej Sahni â€œHimanshuâ€™s work at Clootrack was nothing short of exceptional. Heâ€™s a very reliable and dependable engineer who owns problems and doesnâ€™t shy from going very deep. His understanding of the users sets him apart and he would bring immense value to every team he joins. I would recommend Himanshu for any team looking for a seriously skilled problem solver. â€

projects.title: Attendance System using Facial Recognition (Using MTCNN)
projects.description: - An image of complete classroom along with subject is passed to the API which automatically marks the attendance. Face Recognition model can be trained on each class respectively.

projects.title: Text Detection and Recognition (Using Flask API and pytesseract)
projects.description: - In this project we can send an image using the android app consisting of text, and run a local server. When image is sent to server, the server does the processing using EAST text-detector and revert back the image with bounding box along with the recognized text

projects.title: Home Automation and Security Surveillance (using IoT, Android Studio and Raspberry-pi)
projects.description: - When it comes to our house, this concept can be aptly incorporated toautomate the connected appliances.- It is integrated with Intruder detection (using facial recognition), andManual controlling as a backup option.- Only authenticated user could use the system remotely.

projects.title: Virtual Keyboard
projects.description: - Aim is to use finger detection (fingers as and input object.) to replace aphysical keyboard with virtual one.- A virtual keyboard is displayed on screen of PC and one can give inputusing webcam and fingersâ€™ appropriate position.

projects.title: Digital Out-pass (Android Based Application)
projects.description: - Registration of individual is done using sign-up procedure- Only authenticated user could request for out-pass form - At run-time only date, time and destination are to be entered through phone- Generates serial number for security purposes

projects.title: Tic - Tac - Toe
projects.description: Who haven't heard of this game. Light-fun-mind game created using Android Studio.

projects.title: Signature Verification System (Using Matlab)
projects.description: - Signature of individuals are stored with ID- Proper features detection of fresh signature is done using 'Surf & Harris Algorithm' and are compared with original signature (Using ID) keeping the measuring index below 1 for appropriate comparison

projects.title: Currency Converter
projects.description: This is a simple currency converter application (built using Android Studio) toconvert currency of Thailand to Indian

projects.title: Digital physiology hand-glove (using Raspberry-PI)
projects.description: - Flex sensors were stitched to each finger-sheaths of glove- Gloves are wore and fingers are then bent according to the ability- Raspberry-Pi would detect the change in bent through resistance- The progress of patient can be then analysed .

projects.title: Door-Locking-System (Using Arduino-UNO, Android based Application)
projects.description: - Only registered user ingresses into the app.- Once logged in, app could be able to send "Open" or "Close" instruction through SMS.- Arduino would detect the incoming SMS-instruction and follow up with the same to either Lock or Unlock the door
